application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new external and internal doors and architraves with details of mouldings in section (1:1). With the exception of the Crittall doors, new doors shall be made of solid timber and hand painted. Notwithstanding the approved drawings, new external doors shall have slimline double glazing (maximum 14mm thickness) with integral glazing bars; b) Plan (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new rooflights; c)Details of new service runs [plumbing / drainage / hot and cold water / heating pipework / extraction etc] including details of any associated alteration to fabric including alterations to joists, walling, external outlets, etc) of Listed Building consent LB/24/07498 (Alterations to front elevation, lightwell, rooflight and general internal refurbishment)
